title: Weeve
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A cozy restaurant located downtown. Dine-in downstairs or takeaway. Has clearly labeled vegan choices including meals and desserts. All food is in a refrigerator and you choose of the selection. The products may change, as they come from different local producers. Juices and smoothies also available. Try the tofu panacotta with strawberry jam.
streetAddress: Rua Rodrigo Silva 18, Rua Sao Bento 32
